channel.title: Add objects on project16 v6
channel.description: how i add objects on project16 v6, i dont got [code]public void newobjects[/code] i need to add that or somthing and where?

item.title: Add objects on project16 v6
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

open up client.java and add this method(s)

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } } public void Objectz() { //makeGlobalObject(objectX, objectY,ObjectID, Face, Type); }
objectX is the object x which you can get by typing ::coordson in moparcape client and right clicking the object
objectY is the object x which you can get by typing ::coordson in moparcape client and right clicking the object
ObjectID is the object x which you can get by typing ::coordson in moparcape client and right clicking the object
face is the way the object looks at heres the faces FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
Type is the kind of type heres the types

//ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

place the objects under the method Objectz()
and place

Objectz();

under

 public boolean process()

hope this helps

p.s. this will lag unless you figure out a better way to load them

Read full topic
